Draft Rating:

D-

Wes Unseld ranks in the 23th percentile for drafting among executives in our database. Unseld's draft picks average out to be worth the equivalent of 8 spots lower than they were picked due to their terrible drafting.
Some of their biggest wins:

Some of their biggest busts:

  • Drafted Jared Jeffries with 11th pick but was worth 48th pick.
  • Drafted Juan Dixon with 17th pick but was worth 37th pick.
